extends Shape

        int side,
        int height)
 throws NotShapeException

        Parameters:
        x - the x value of the coordinate of the Rhombus

        c - the Color of the Rhombus
        side - the side length of the Rhombus
        height - the height of the Rhombus
        Throws:
        NotShapeException - if the dimensions can not make the desired shape
